DOC.brief_summary: This first study oral tofacitinib adult active ankylose spondylitis . It design obtain information efficacy safety 3 different dos tofacitinib .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-Ranging Study Of Tofacitinib In Adults With Active Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis Ankylosing Spondylitis Has active disease despite concurrent nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) treatment intolerant NSAIDs Pregnant lactate female Currently receive previous use Tumor Necrosis Factor ( TNF ) inhibitor biological agent
